text.div: <xhtml:div xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><xhtml:p>Procedures Section</xhtml:p><xhtml:ol><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] extension (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1150-466).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] identifier (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="47519-4" History of Procedures (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1150-467).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] source (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] date (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ordered (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] mode="snapshot" (CONF:1150-767).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:1150-468) such that it</p><ol><li><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity (identifier: http://www.lantanagroup.com/camara/fhir/procedure-activity) (CONF:1150-607).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] emptyReason (CONF:X-X).</p></li></xhtml:ol></xhtml:div>

constraint.name: id
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: extension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] extension (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: modifierExtension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: language
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: text
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:1150-466).

constraint.name: contained
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: identifier
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] identifier (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: code
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="47519-4" History of Procedures (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:1150-467).

constraint.name: subject
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] subject (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: source
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] source (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: date
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] date (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: ordered
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ordered (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: mode
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] mode="snapshot" (CONF:1150-767).

constraint.name: entry
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:1150-468) such that it

constraint.name: item
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Procedure Activity (identifier: http://www.lantanagroup.com/camara/fhir/procedure-activity) (CONF:1150-607).

constraint.name: emptyReason
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] emptyReason (CONF:X-X).

text.div: <xhtml:div xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><xhtml:p>Procedure Activity</xhtml:p><xhtml:ol><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] extension (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] identifier="#AUTO_GENERATE:HIDE#" (CONF:1150-586).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] type (ValueSet: Common Procedures urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.12 STATIC 2015-06-04) (CONF:1150-587).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] bodySite, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-592).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] indication (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:1150-595).</p><ol><li><p>The performer, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] US Realm Author (identifier: http://www.lantanagroup.com/camara/fhir/us-realm-author) (CONF:1150-730).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] date (CONF:1150-588).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] encounter (CONF:1150-606).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] outcome (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] report (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] complication (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] followUp (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] relatedItem (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] notes (CONF:X-X).</p></li></xhtml:ol></xhtml:div>

constraint.name: id
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: extension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] extension (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: modifierExtension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: language
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: text
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: contained
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: identifier
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] identifier="#AUTO_GENERATE:HIDE#" (CONF:1150-586).

constraint.name: subject
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: type
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] type (ValueSet: Common Procedures urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.12 STATIC 2015-06-04) (CONF:1150-587).

constraint.name: bodySite
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] bodySite, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-592).

constraint.name: indication
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] indication (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: performer
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:1150-595).

constraint.name: person
constraint.human: The performer, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] US Realm Author (identifier: http://www.lantanagroup.com/camara/fhir/us-realm-author) (CONF:1150-730).

constraint.name: date
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] date (CONF:1150-588).

constraint.name: encounter
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] encounter (CONF:1150-606).

constraint.name: outcome
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] outcome (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: report
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] report (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: complication
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] complication (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: followUp
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] followUp (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: relatedItem
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] relatedItem (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: notes
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] notes (CONF:X-X).

text.div: <xhtml:div xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><xhtml:p>US Realm Patient</xhtml:p><xhtml:ol><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] extension (CONF:1150-181) such that it</p><ol><li><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @url="http://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/us-core#ethnicity" (CONF:1150-182).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] valueCodeableConcept, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Axesson_Ethnicity urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.10 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-183).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] extension (CONF:1150-837) such that it</p><ol><li><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @url="http://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/us-core#race" (CONF:1150-838).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] valueCodeableConcept (ValueSet: Race urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914) (CONF:1150-839).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain at least one [1..*] identifier (CONF:1150-79).</p><ol><li><p>Such identifiers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] system (ValueSet: Patient Identifier Types urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.3 STATIC 2015-02-25) (CONF:1150-736).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:1150-80).</p><ol><li><p>Such names SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] family (CONF:1150-174).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>Such names SHALL contain at least one [1..*] given (CONF:1150-175).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:1150-78).</p><ol><li><p>The telecom, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1150-280).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The telecom, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Telecom Use (US Realm Header) urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-81).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] gender, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Axesson_Gender_AdministrativeGender urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.6 DYNAMIC 2015-01-07 (CONF:1150-82).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthDate (CONF:1150-83).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] deceasedBoolean (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] deceasedDateTime (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] address (CONF:1150-84).</p><ol><li><p>The address, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PostalAddressUse urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10637 STATIC 2005-05-01 (CONF:1150-168).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The address, if present, SHALL contain at least one [1..*] line (CONF:1150-172).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The address, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] city (CONF:1150-170).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The address, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-171).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The address, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] zip, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet PostalCode urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-173).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The address, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] country, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Country urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.63 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-169).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatus, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Axesson_MaritalStatus urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.8 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-176).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] multipleBirthBoolean (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] multipleBirthInteger (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] photo (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] contact (CONF:1150-306).</p><ol><li><p>The contact, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] relationship (ValueSet: PersonalRelationshipRoleType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19563 DYNAMIC) (CONF:1150-725).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The contact, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1150-726).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>The contact, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:1150-727).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] animal (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] communication, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-177).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] careProvider (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] managingOrganization (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] link (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] active (CONF:X-X).</p></li></xhtml:ol></xhtml:div>

constraint.name: id
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: extension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] extension (CONF:1150-181) such that it

constraint.name: @url
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @url="http://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/us-core#ethnicity" (CONF:1150-182).

constraint.name: valueCodeableConcept
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] valueCodeableConcept, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Axesson_Ethnicity urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.10 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-183).

constraint.name: extension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] extension (CONF:1150-837) such that it

constraint.name: @url
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @url="http://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/us-core#race" (CONF:1150-838).

constraint.name: valueCodeableConcept
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] valueCodeableConcept (ValueSet: Race urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914) (CONF:1150-839).

constraint.name: modifierExtension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: language
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: text
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: contained
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: identifier
constraint.human: SHALL contain at least one [1..*] identifier (CONF:1150-79).

constraint.name: system
constraint.human: Such identifiers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] system (ValueSet: Patient Identifier Types urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.3 STATIC 2015-02-25) (CONF:1150-736).

constraint.name: name
constraint.human: SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:1150-80).

constraint.name: family
constraint.human: Such names SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] family (CONF:1150-174).

constraint.name: given
constraint.human: Such names SHALL contain at least one [1..*] given (CONF:1150-175).

constraint.name: telecom
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:1150-78).

constraint.name: value
constraint.human: The telecom, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1150-280).

constraint.name: use
constraint.human: The telecom, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Telecom Use (US Realm Header) urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-81).

constraint.name: gender
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] gender, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Axesson_Gender_AdministrativeGender urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.6 DYNAMIC 2015-01-07 (CONF:1150-82).

constraint.name: birthDate
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthDate (CONF:1150-83).

constraint.name: deceasedBoolean
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] deceasedBoolean (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: deceasedDateTime
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] deceasedDateTime (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: address
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] address (CONF:1150-84).

constraint.name: use
constraint.human: The address, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet PostalAddressUse urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10637 STATIC 2005-05-01 (CONF:1150-168).

constraint.name: line
constraint.human: The address, if present, SHALL contain at least one [1..*] line (CONF:1150-172).

constraint.name: city
constraint.human: The address, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] city (CONF:1150-170).

constraint.name: state
constraint.human: The address, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-171).

constraint.name: zip
constraint.human: The address, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] zip, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet PostalCode urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-173).

constraint.name: country
constraint.human: The address, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] country, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Country urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.63 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-169).

constraint.name: maritalStatus
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatus, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Axesson_MaritalStatus urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.8 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-176).

constraint.name: multipleBirthBoolean
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] multipleBirthBoolean (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: multipleBirthInteger
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] multipleBirthInteger (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: photo
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] photo (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: contact
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] contact (CONF:1150-306).

constraint.name: relationship
constraint.human: The contact, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] relationship (ValueSet: PersonalRelationshipRoleType urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19563 DYNAMIC) (CONF:1150-725).

constraint.name: name
constraint.human: The contact, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1150-726).

constraint.name: telecom
constraint.human: The contact, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:1150-727).

constraint.name: animal
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] animal (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: communication
constraint.human: SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] communication, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-177).

constraint.name: careProvider
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] careProvider (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: managingOrganization
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] managingOrganization (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: link
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] link (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: active
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] active (CONF:X-X).

text.div: <xhtml:div xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><xhtml:p>US Realm Custodian</xhtml:p><xhtml:ol><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] extension (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain at least one [1..*] identifier (CONF:1150-294).</p><ol><li><p>Such identifiers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] system (ValueSet: Organization Identifier Types urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.1 STATIC 2015-02-25) (CONF:1150-738).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1150-295).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] type (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:1150-296).</p><ol><li><p>This telecom SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1150-1452).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>This telecom SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Telecom Use (US Realm Header) urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-297).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] address (CONF:1150-298).</p><ol><li><p>This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use (CONF:1150-299).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] line (CONF:1150-300).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] city (CONF:1150-301).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-302).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] zip, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet PostalCode urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-303).</p></li></ol><ol><li><p>This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] country, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Country urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.63 (CONF:1150-304).</p></li></ol></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] partOf (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contact (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or more [0..*] location (CONF:X-X).</p></li><li xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><p>MAY contain zero or one [0..1] active (CONF:X-X).</p></li></xhtml:ol></xhtml:div>

constraint.name: id
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] id (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: extension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] extension (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: modifierExtension
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] modifierExtension (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: language
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] language (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: text
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: contained
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contained (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: identifier
constraint.human: SHALL contain at least one [1..*] identifier (CONF:1150-294).

constraint.name: system
constraint.human: Such identifiers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] system (ValueSet: Organization Identifier Types urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.3.1 STATIC 2015-02-25) (CONF:1150-738).

constraint.name: name
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1150-295).

constraint.name: type
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] type (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: telecom
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:1150-296).

constraint.name: value
constraint.human: This telecom SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1150-1452).

constraint.name: use
constraint.human: This telecom SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Telecom Use (US Realm Header) urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.20 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-297).

constraint.name: address
constraint.human: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] address (CONF:1150-298).

constraint.name: use
constraint.human: This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] use (CONF:1150-299).

definition.formal:
C-CDA R1.1: *SHALL* contain exactly one [1..1] streetAddressLine (CONF:7291).
Because nullFlavor is allowed in C-CDA streetAddressLine, FHIR profile line is *SHOULD* 0..1 - transforms between CDA and FHIR will need to take nullFlavor into account.

constraint.name: line
constraint.human: This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] line (CONF:1150-300).

definition.formal:
C-CDA R1.1: *SHALL* contain exactly one [1..1] city (CONF:7292).
Because nullFlavor is allowed in C-CDA city, FHIR profile city is *SHOULD* 0..1 - transforms between CDA and FHIR will need to take nullFlavor into account.

constraint.name: city
constraint.human: This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] city (CONF:1150-301).

definition.formal: C-CDA R1.1: State is required if the country is US. If country is not specified, it's assumed to be US. If country is something other than US, the state *MAY* be present but *MAY* be bound to different vocabularies (CONF:10024)

constraint.name: state
constraint.human: This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-302).

definition.formal: C-CDA R1.1: PostalCode is required if the country is US. If country is not specified, it's assumed to be US. If country is something other than US, the postalCode *MAY* be present but *MAY* be bound to different vocabularies (CONF:10025)

constraint.name: zip
constraint.human: This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] zip, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet PostalCode urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:1150-303).

constraint.name: country
constraint.human: This address SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] country, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Country urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.63 (CONF:1150-304).

constraint.name: partOf
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] partOf (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: contact
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] contact (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: location
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or more [0..*] location (CONF:X-X).

constraint.name: active
constraint.human: MAY contain zero or one [0..1] active (CONF:X-X).
